openconsensus.stats

Class Measure

  • java.lang.Object
    • openconsensus.stats.Measure

  • @Immutable
public abstract class Measure
extends Object
    The definition of the Measurement that is taken by OpenConsensus library.
    Since:
    0.1.0

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public abstract String getName()
        Name of measure, as a String. Should be a ASCII string with a length no greater than 255 characters.

        Suggested format for name: <web_host>/<path>.

        Returns:
        the name of this measure.
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • getDescription

        public abstract String getDescription()
        Detailed description of the measure, used in documentation.
        Returns:
        the description of this measure.
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • getUnit

        public abstract String getUnit()
        The units in which Measure values are measured.

        The suggested grammar for a unit is as follows:

        • Expression = Component { "." Component } {"/" Component };
        • Component = [ PREFIX ] UNIT [ Annotation ] | Annotation | "1";
        • Annotation = "{" NAME "}" ;

        For example, string “MBy{transmitted}/ms” stands for megabytes per milliseconds, and the annotation transmitted inside {} is just a comment of the unit.

        Returns:
        the unit of this measure.
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • createMeasurement

        public final Measurement createMeasurement(double value)
        Returns a new Measurement for this Measure.
        Parameters:
        value - the corresponding value for the Measurement.
        Returns:
        a new Measurement for this Measure.

        Constructs a new Measure.
        Parameters:

        description - description of Measure.
        unit - unit of Measure.
        Returns:
        a Measure.
        Since:
        0.1.0
